main event: A report of a UFO sighting in Midland, Texas, described as a round object changing colors.
interesting points: The object's size was compared to that of an auto tail light,The observation lasted for 2-3 minutes,The UFO changed colors from red to green to white,The sighting occurred at approximately 10:15 PM in clear conditions with light clouds and haze,An observer used 7x50 binoculars to view the object.
